p: Although three species of Sabethes spp. were collected (n = 42 specimens), YFV infection was not detected in any of them. Among the collected species, only Sabethes ( Sabethes) albiprivus Theobald, 1903 has been found to be naturally infected by YFV in South America [ 26]. It is likely that more species of Sabethes than those already incriminated play a secondary role in YFV maintenance [ 5, 27].
